sentence.Network_en: Tangram wood set! Tangram is usually stored a square format.
sentence.Network_cn: 木制的七巧板! 通常是以正方形的方式收藏.

sentence.Network_en: Tangram is a toy comprised of many geometrical pieces that can be put together.
sentence.Network_cn: 七巧板就是用许多几何图形进行拼凑的一种玩具.

sentence.Network_en: The sheet - let takes the tangram a puzzle game comprising seven pieces, as its subject.
sentence.Network_cn: 这款邮票小型张以拼图游戏“七巧板”为主题.

means.word_mean: 1. a Chinese puzzle consisting of a square divided into seven pieces that must be arranged to match particular designs
